name: unsmart
content:
unsmart adjective
(NOT INTELLIGENT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
Mainly US not done in an intelligent way: Backing losers was unsmart business. This is a pretty unsmart investment at present. Synonyms
dumb (STUPID) mainly US informal
foolish
stupid
More examplesFewer examplesThis was a classic example of unsmart procurement.

unsmart adjective
(NOT STYLISH)
Mainly UK not looking clean and stylish, or not attracting stylish people: The street was full of cheap, unsmart cafés. Although caravanning does not have a good image now, it was not always so unsmart. Opposite
stylish

unsmart adjective
(TECHNOLOGY)
not able to be connected to the internet or not having features that a computer has: My phone is a very old, unsmart mobile. Synonym
dumb (DEVICE)
